titan_pylib.graph.namori のソースコード

 1from typing import List
 2


[ドキュメント]
 3class Namori():
 4
 5  def __init__(self, G: List[List[int]]):
 6    n = len(G)
 7    deg = [0] * n
 8    for v in range(n):
 9      for x in G[v]:
10        deg[x] += 1
11    todo = [i for i, x in enumerate(deg) if x == 1]
12    cycle = set(range(n))
13    while todo:
14      v = todo.pop()
15      cycle.discard(v)
16      for x in G[v]:
17        deg[x] -= 1
18        if deg[x] == 1:
19          todo.append(x)
20    tree = []
21    treeid = [-1] * n
22    now = 0
23    cycle_list = list(cycle)
24    for i in cycle_list:
25      tmp = []
26      todo = [i]
27      treeid[i] = now
28      while todo:
29        v = todo.pop()
30        tmp.append(v)
31        for x in G[v]:
32          if treeid[x] != -1 or x in cycle:
33            continue
34          todo.append(x)
35          treeid[x] = now
36      now += 1
37      tree.append(tmp)
38    # tree[i][j]:= cycle[i]を根とする木
39    # tree[i][0]は常に根
40    self.cycle = cycle_list
41    self.tree = tree
42    self.treeid = treeid
43


[ドキュメント]
44  def same_tree(self, u: int, v: int) -> bool:
45    return self.treeid[u] == self.treeid[v]


46


[ドキュメント]
47  def get_cycle(self):
48    return self.cycle


49


[ドキュメント]
50  def get_tree(self):
51    return self.tree




52
